This is a holly habbit by Jews and only anti-Semites criticize it. Every Jewish man, even converted adults must go through this ritual otherwise they are not considered Jews.
The blood contains the soul in the Jewish believe and has a special meaning. Only holly people may take human blood, mostly rabbis or Jews living for God. Jews having less connection to God may drink only animal blood.
